question1.question: How can I send a parcel from Ukraine abroad?
question1.answer:
Your shipments travel through the country via our warehouse in the village of Hostyntseve (Lviv region).

Send parcels to this address via Nova Poshta:

Lviv region, village Hostyntseve, branch No. 1

Recipient: FOP Kysil Lyudmyla Anatoliyivna

EDRPOU: 3221718269

Phone: +380 (95) 801-04-74

question2.question: How do we calculate the delivery time of a parcel from Ukraine abroad?
question2.answer:
Delivery time is calculated from the moment your parcel leaves our warehouse in Ukraine (village Hostyntseve, Lviv region).
The minimum delivery time is from 2 days (we work without weekends).

question3.question: Is my parcel insured and how much does it cost?
question3.answer:
Of course!

  • All parcels from Ukraine to Poland are insured, the insurance payment is 3% of the declared value.
  • All parcels from Poland to Ukraine are insured, the insurance payment is 1% of the declared value.

This is a mandatory insurance payment that protects your parcel.

question4.question: How can I reduce the cost of shipping from Ukraine?
question4.answer:
If your parcel is packed at the post office, carefully check the packing dimensions against the actual size of your parcel! Every extra centimeter adds cost :(

So ask the operator to trim the box if it is too large. Yes, you have the right to do so!

How to trim the box yourself, watch this video!

question5.question: Who should pay for the shipment?
question5.answer:
• If the parcel is sent from Ukraine, it can be paid by either the recipient or the sender.
  • If the parcel is sent to Ukraine, only the sender must pay.

question6.question: What cannot be transported from Ukraine to the European Union?
question6.answer:
• Alcohol,
  • Tobacco (in any form) and electronic cigarettes,
  • Precious metals,
  • Money,
  • Meat products and lard,
  • Dairy products,
  • Fish roe,
  • Fur products, and others.


    • Parcels with prohibited items or substances will be returned to the sender at additional cost.

question7.question: Can I send an expensive parcel to Ukraine?
question7.answer:
If the value of the parcel exceeds 1000 PLN, the sender must pay 10% of the difference.

How do we calculate?

Example: 1500 PLN - 1000 PLN = 500 PLN x 10% = 50 PLN (additional payment).
We add this amount to the tariff cost.

question8.question: How can I order a parcel from a Ukrainian online store and have it delivered to Europe?
question8.answer:
When you buy a product from an online store:

  • Enter the following delivery details:

    Nova Poshta, Lviv region, village Hostyntseve, branch No. 1 (Up to 1000 kg and dimensions up to 70 cm x 170 cm x 300 cm).
    Recipient: FOP Kysil Lyudmyla Anatoliyivna
    EDRPOU: 3221718269
    +380 (95) 801-04-74.

  • Fill out this form. This will let us know where to send your parcel :)
  • When the parcel arrives in Poland, you will receive an SMS from IVANCOM.

delivery.courierTitle: Send easily: courier and InPost lockers
delivery.courierDescription: IVANCOM provides fast and reliable courier delivery in Poland, operating in major cities such as Warsaw, Krakow, Wroclaw, and others. Your parcels do not go through terminals, minimizing the risk of damage, and Ukrainian-speaking couriers make communication easy. In some cities, free parcel pickup is available. Ordering a courier is easy – just contact the IVANCOM office in your city, and we will take care of the rest!
delivery.inpostTitle: With InPost lockers, forget about queues
delivery.inpostDescription: Send parcels from Poland to Ukraine at any time, as the lockers are available 24/7. The shipment process takes just a few steps: fill in the details, receive a code, place the parcel in the nearest locker – and you're done! Your parcel is tracked along the entire route, and the recipient can pick it up at a Nova Poshta branch or order courier delivery. Choose a convenient shipping format at competitive rates!

about.careTrustTitle: Care and trust in every journey
about.careTrustPart1: We are a family company that has turned transportation into a lifelong commitment. Since our founding in 2017, we have helped thousands of people travel comfortably and safely between Ukraine and Poland.
about.careTrustPart2: From parcel and document delivery to pet transportation, we provide services that meet your needs and quality standards. At IVANCOM, we care not only about every client but also about those in need. Supporting the Armed Forces of Ukraine, charity, and caring for people is our contribution to a shared future. Learn more about our history, values, and team.

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!

about.headline: Helping you stay closer!
about.description: Logistics with a human touch: fast delivery between Ukraine and Europe, transparent rates, and a personalized approach.
about.logistics_journey: Behind the Scenes of Logistics: The Journey of Your Parcel
about.titleTeam: Let's get to know each other better!
about.contentTeam:
Since opening our first office in Krakow on December 2, 2020, IVANCOM has grown into a true family where everyone finds support and understanding. We help send parcels to Ukraine, organize the delivery of medicines, documents, and goods, provide pet transportation, relocations, and other logistics services.

During this time, our team has grown to over 40 employees, we have 5 stationary branches in Poland (Katowice, Krakow, Warsaw, Wroclaw, and Gdansk), several mobile branches, our own fleet, and a sorting base in Ukraine. We have already survived the pandemic, and now, as much as we can, we help the Armed Forces of Ukraine accelerate victory. Throughout all this time, we have been actively volunteering and supporting not only the army but also people and even animals – because for us, it is important to be humane, to provide care and support to everyone who needs it.

Join our IVANCOM family and share our belief in Ukraine's bright future!
about.titleStrong: Together – Stronger: Helping Those in Need!
about.part1Strong: Helping is not just charity; it's a way to be there during the most difficult moments. IVANCOM began its path of volunteering back in 2019, when we supported orphanages, helped animals in shelters, and collected humanitarian aid for those who found themselves in difficult life situations.
about.part2Strong: When dark times came for Ukraine, we did not stand aside. During the first days of the full-scale war, our team organized the evacuation of women, children, and the elderly from hotspots, provided assistance to displaced people, and delivered humanitarian aid to the most dangerous regions. We raised funds to purchase vehicles, military equipment, thermal imagers, and medicines for our defenders.
about.part3Strong: But volunteering is not only about helping during wartime. It’s about continuously caring for those in need. We support children's hospitals, help people in need, organize donation drives for displaced persons, and feed animals in shelters. We know that every good deed matters.
about.part4Strong: Join our initiative. Together, we can change the world for the better!
about.text1: We transported a surgical trailer and an off-road vehicle to the Zaporizhzhia direction
about.text2: Our friends from all over the world helped with this and made a short film.
about.partnersText: We collaborate with reliable companies all over the world.

step1.description: Using any courier service to this address:

step2.title: Pay for shipping to Ukraine

step3.title: Don't worry about anything!
step3.description: The recipient will receive a notification about the parcel's arrival via the Nova Poshta app or SMS.

courier.courierDescription: We will arrive at a convenient time for you, carefully deliver the cargo, and provide reliable service.
courier.title: In which cities is IVANCOM courier available?
courier.description: By choosing IVANCOM couriers, you receive professional service where every logistics detail is considered. Our Ukrainian-speaking couriers ensure easy communication and an individual approach to each client. We care about safe and fast delivery, allowing you to focus on what matters most – growing your business or fulfilling personal needs. Choose IVANCOM – convenience, quality, and reliability in every shipment!
